item.title: Conference Presentations
item.description: Gilmore, S., Nespoli, G., Copelli, F., & Russo, F.A. (July, 2021). Subjective groove modulates neural entrainment in premotor and auditory regions. Oral presentation at the International Conference on Music Perception and Cognition Meeting (ICMPC16-ESCOM11). Virtual meeting. Rovetti, J., Copelli, F., Wood, E.A., Gilmore, S., & Russo, F.A. (November, 2020). Speech emotion activates the pre-supplementary motor area. Poster presentation at the 19th Annual Auditory Perception, Cognition, and Action Meeting. Virtual meeting.

item.title: Research Experience
item.description: Sept. 2016 – Aug. 2021 Lab Manager & Technician at the SMART Lab, Ryerson University         Additional roles:             Assistant Manuscript Coordinator of AIRS Volume I; May. 2019 – Mar. 2020             Project manager of SingWell; May. 2018 – Aug. 2021 May 2016 – Apr. 2017 Research Assistant at the MAPLE Lab, McMaster University Sept. 2015 – May 2016 Independent Thesis Student at the SMART Lab, Ryerson University Sept. 2014 – Sept. 2015 Research Assistant at the SMART Lab, Ryerson University
